title: Video: Young Wonder – Flesh
content:
Taking a sample from The Avalanches is effectively sampling a sample, right? So say someone was to take a sample of Flesh, the new track by Young Wonder, and included it in their own work, they would be creating a sample of a sample of a sample….

I N C E P T….

Anyway, Flesh is a huge track, yearning to be blasted through a top quality speaker system in London’s slickest clubs. Using the aforementioned sample to wondrous effect, complimented by the stunning vocals of Young Wonder’s Rachel Koeman, and all rounded off by yet another unique video from Cork collective Feel Good Lost, I don’t think I’ve heard a more danceable track so far this year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
